Row.Text: Frontier Expansion
Gain 100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold every time you improve a Resource.
[BLIST][LI]Gain [B]100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold [/B]every time you improve a [B]Resource[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Statue of Liberty[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being America's associated Wonder.
River Raids
Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture when pillaging Buildings or Improvements equal to the yield or healing gained. Land Military Units gain the Amphibious ability.

[BLIST][LI]Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] [B]Culture [/B]when [B]pillaging [/B]Buildings or Improvements equal to the yield or healing gained.[LI][B]Land Military Units [/B]gain the [B]Amphibious [/B]ability.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Muzibu Azaala Mpanga[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Buganda's associated Wonder.
Liberté, Egalité, Fraternité
You can select the Celebration effects of any standard Government in Modern Age.
You have the passive effects of all standard Governments in Modern Age, and can select from any of their Celebration effects.

[BLIST][LI]You can select the [B]Celebration effects [/B]of any standard [B]Government [/B]in Modern Age.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Eiffel Tower[/B].[/LIST]

[LIST][LI]You have the [B]passive effects [/B] of all standard [B]Governments [/B]in Modern Age, and can select from any of their [B]Celebration effects[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Eiffel Tower[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the French Empire's associated Wonder.
Goisshin
When you Overbuild a Building, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 50% of the Building's Production cost.

[BLIST][LI]When you [B]Overbuild [/B]a Building, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] [B]Science [/B]equal to [B]50% [/B]of the Building's Production cost.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Dogo Onsen[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Meiji's associated Wonder.
Revolución
Starts with a unique Government, Revolución. This Government has one Celebration effect, +30% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for 10 Turns. Cannot enter any other Government type.

[BLIST][LI]Starts with a unique Government, [B]Revolución[/B]. This Government has one Celebration effect, [B]+30% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]for 10 Turns. Cannot enter any other Government type.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Palacio de Bellas Artes[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Mexico's associated Wonder.
Paradise of Nations
+75% to all [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold yields. -25% to all other yields.
[BLIST][LI][B]+75% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold [/B]yields.[LI][B]-25% [/B]to all other yields.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Red Fort[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Mughal's associated Wonder.
Blood and Iron
Units receive +1 Combat Strength for every Unfriendly or worse Civ Relationship.
[BLIST][LI]Units receive +1 Combat Strength for every Unfriendly or worse Civ Relationship.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Brandenburg Gate[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Prussia's associated Wonder.
Kang Qian Shengshi
+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence, but -1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from Imported Resources.

[BLIST][LI][B]+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence, [/B]but [B]-1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]from [B]imported Resources[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Chengde Mountain Resort[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Qing's associated Wonder.
Prosveshchenie
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Districts, doubled in Tundra.

[BLIST][LI][B]+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture [/B]and [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science [/B]on [B]Districts[/B], doubled in [B]Tundra[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Hermitage[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Russia's associated Wonder.
Itsaraphab
Gains a unique Diplomatic Action to immediately become Suzerain of a City-State at a higher [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence cost than Befriend Independent.

[BLIST][LI]Gains a unique [B]Diplomatic Action [/B]to immediately become [B]Suzerain [/B]of a [B]City-State [/B]at a higher [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence cost than Befriend Independent.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Doi Suthep[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Siam's associated Wonder.
